attributes.action: Rethink the proposed further intrusion into our privacy of Council Tax Inspectors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our country is already awash with the trappings of a 'Big Brother' society and the beginnings of a Police State, we would therefore request that the proposed further intrusions into our private lives and Civil liberties by forcing us to accept 'Council Tax Inspectors' snooping into our homes are cancelled.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
